channel.title: Elixir on Vinod Kurup
channel.description: Recent content in Elixir on Vinod Kurup

item.title: Advent of Code Elixir Day 1
item.description: There’s this cool thing called Advent of Code, described best here. I found out about it while reading my favorite weekly weblog and so I’ve decided to try my fledgling (maybe flailing is a better word?) Elixir skills on it. There are 2 puzzles each day (day_1_0 and day_1_1 are my solutions). Here’s my code for Day 1: @doc """ Find 2 numbers in file that sum to 2020 and return their product.
